name: Tank Go - Fire For Stars
description:
Fight for the stars!
This is a fresh new tank battle game.
There are many enemies on the way.
There are forts, soldiers, tanks…
You have to control your tank fire up and avoid the enemy's artillery.
You can call a helicopter to assist in the battle, and you can also fire a rocket at the enemy.
Reasonable operation will greatly enhance your overall combat capability.
FEATURES:
* Beautiful graphics
* 30 levels spanning
* 3 game modes: FUN, ENJOYABLE, and TRICKY!
* many bullets to choose from
